name: Soda City Tycoon - Idle Empire
description:
Rising temperatures has increased the demand for exotic drinks! Many new soda tycoons have emerged, each with their secret soda recipe to get in on the gold rush and sell as many sodas as they can.

Chill sodas, build brewing centers, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced soda city in the world.

An incremental clicker game at its core, Soda City Tycoon uses many elements from clicker and simulation games that give it a one of kind feel. Enjoy the 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a cluster of soda bottles. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient soda city.

More experienced incremental clicker players and players familiar with Mindstorm Studios simulation games will love the new gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a huge soda city with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Soda Bottle swarm!
- Hundreds of research items
- Hundreds of missions
- Many different brewing centers and shipping vehicles
- An elaborate Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3D graphics
